message: You started high, now it's my turn to try to get more
You're trying to take advantage of me, but I'll give you a slightly better deal
You're getting desperate, I'll try to squeeze more out of you
I'm not going to give up yet, I'll try to make a comeback
You're running out of time, I'll take what I can get
I'm running out of options, but I'll try to make one last stand
I'm not going to back down, take it or leave it
